summary: After a series of bizarre actions, Loris is mistaken for a serial killer. Jessica, a policewoman in undercover, will try to induce him to commit a murder.
cast: Roberto Benigni|Michel Blanc|Nicoletta Braschi|Dominique Lavanant|Jean-Claude Brialy|Laurent Spielvogel|Ivano Marescotti|Franco Mescolini|Massimo Girotti|Luciana Palombi|Vittorio Amandola|Rita Di Lernia|Gennaro Morrone|Vincenzo Vitagliano|Giulio Turli|Flavio de Flavis|Roberto Corbiletto|Luisa Malcotti|Alessandra Celi|Eugenio Masciari|Giuseppe Misiti|Danilo Nigrelli|Antonio Cennamo|Antonella Tomassi|Paola Casale|Tot√≤ Onnis|Laura Scarimbolo|Antonella Lops|Davide Bechini|Francesco Mazzini
title: El monstruo
